Plot: Confused by metaphysics? In a muddle with aesthetics? Intimidated by Kant? Then look no further "Philosophy For Dummies, UK Edition" is a complete crash-course in philosophical thought, covering key philosophers, philosophical history and theory and the big questions that affect us today. Tying in with standard UK curricula and including core topics such as logic, ethics and political philosophy, this impartial, expert guide cuts through the jargon to give you the facts. Whether you're a philosophy student or a complete beginner, "Philosophy For Dummies, UK Edition" will get you thinking and talking about philosophy in no time, and with maximum confidence.
